17. **Front command dial** - Page 6
18. **ON/OFF switch** - Page 41
19. **Shutter button** - Page 49
20. **Flash** - Page 123
21. **Body cap** - Page 33
22. **Microphone/remote release connector (ø3.5 mm)** - Pages 61, 215
23. **USB connector (Type-C)** - Pages 37, 246
24. **HDMI Micro connector (Type D)** - Page 51

> **Note:** Use of an optional RR-100 remote release requires a third-party adapter to convert the three-pin, ø2.5 mm connector to a three-pin, ø3.5 mm connector.
